game.name: Backrooms: Extractions
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cooperate with up to 6 players to explore, search, and extract lost agents within the Backrooms. Solve puzzles, unlock tools, survive against entities, and progress through increasingly dangerous levels.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cooperate with up to 6 players to explore, search, and extract lost agents within the Backrooms. Solve puzzles, unlock tools, survive against entities, and progress through increasingly dangerous levels.

reviewHighlights.text: 살려주십시오 .. 제발 한글 패치를 만들어주십시오.. 전 영어가 싫습니다... 죄송합니다 죄송합니다 죄송합니다 죄송합니다
